title: Friend list not updating
body: Having an issue where my friend list doesn't accurately update the status of people and idk how to fix it. Sometimes it will display people that are on as offline, or say they are in queue when they aren't etc.... The only real solution i found was to just reload the client but my friend list bugs out again eventually. I tried reformating my SSD and re-installing league but still seems to happen. any help much appreciated.

replies.body: yea ive been having this problem for a while now too and the only way ive been able to update friend's list was by going to options and clicking and unclicking "group mobile" or one of those options...
That's strange!  Something like this can happen if your Windows clock is out of Sync.  Double check your PC clock to make sure it's accurate, and let me know if that helps.

I've also been having this issue for the last couple months, and gets irritating when I have to log off and on again after every game to invite a friend to play, or to see if new friends have logged on.

I have this problem as well, and my PC clock appears to be correct
